meanings.definition: A person who studies hard and diligently.
meanings.sent1: The swotter always has their nose in a book, studying for exams.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a dedicated swotter, always working hard to achieve good grades.
meanings.sent3: The swotter was so focused on studying that they forgot to eat lunch!
meanings.sent4: She was a swotter, absorbing knowledge like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The swotter's determination to learn is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: I need to swotter for my upcoming history test.
meanings.sent2: Students often swotter late into the night before important exams.
meanings.sent3: He decided to swotter all weekend to prepare for the science fair.
meanings.sent4: She will swotter until she knows every detail for the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The students swotter diligently to improve their grades.
